steps.1: Add-1/2 tsp baking powder to a blender
steps.2: Serve-Serve the pancakes with chopped strawberries
steps.3: Melt-Melt a small knob of butter in a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat
steps.6: Cook-Cook for 1 min or until the tops start to bubble
steps.8: Flip-Flip the pancakes with a fork or a fish slice spatula
steps.11: Pour-Pour three little puddles straight from the blender into the frying pan
steps.12: Add-1 heaped tbsp flour to a blender
